name: Stomp Duel
description:
Stomp Duel is a simple 2-player couch competitive party platformer where you and another friend have a go at stomping each other out within 60 seconds.

Features:
Three Unique characters - You and a friend can choose between one of three unique characters with varying stats

Three Arena’s - From a Simple box to the open meadows and an enclosed complex, each with their own unique aesthetic

Power ups - To give yourself  a fighting chance to get back in the duel or to deny your opponents their chance to win
